Super Powers: Digital Omniscience: Hacks any camera/mic; controls traffic & grids; erases digital footprints.
Weaknesses: No Signal: Powerless in Faraday cages/dead zones. Social Battery: Drains fast in crowds.
Costume / Visuals: Black tech-wear hoodie, cargo pants, combat boots, asymmetrical headset with holo-monocle.
Signature Move: "The Ghost Protocol": Erases team from all digital feeds instantly.

Super Powers: Living Sketchbook: Drawings become real 3D objects (bridges, cages, ladders).
Weaknesses: Imposter Syndrome: Constructs crumble if he loses confidence. Water: Ink dissolves in rain.
Costume / Visuals: Red zip-up hoodie, messy hair, glowing stylus behind ear, ink-stained hands.
Signature Move: " The Finisher": Draws a massive solution (rocket, net) to end the fight.

Super Powers: Calculated Trajectory: Redirects attacks with 100% accuracy. Audit Vision: Sees mathematical weak points.
Weaknesses: The Nixon Distraction: Freezes if BF texts. Teenage Priorities: Will leave fight for a date.
Costume / Visuals: Volleyball uniform (spandex/knee pads) with a professional blazer. Dark rimmed glasses.
Signature Move: "The Return to Sender": Catches a projectile and spikes it back at double speed.

Super Powers: Velocity Strength: Invulnerable & super strong only when moving. Vehicle Mastery: Pushes cars beyond limits.
Weaknesses: Idle Speed: Weak if forced to stand still. Road Rage: Loses focus if she sees bullies.
Costume / Visuals: Black leather racing jacket, skinny jeans, helmet, wields a tire iron.
Signature Move: " The Pit Maneuver": Slams into enemy at high speed to shatter their defense.

Super Powers: Sonic Resonance: Claps/stomps create concussive blasts. Vibe Check: Tracks enemies through walls via sound.
Weaknesses: Volume Control: Accidentally breaks own team's gear. The Permit: Can't legally drive.
Costume / Visuals: Baggy jeans, Nikes, oversized hoodie with band logo, massive headphones around neck.
Signature Move: "The Bass Drop": A massive stomp that knocks back all enemies in radius.

Super Powers: Suspiciously Polite: Deflects all interrogation. The Ghost: Vanishes when adults appear.
Weaknesses: Family Trust: The Dad (Jeremy) and Uncle (Luke) actively distrust him.
Costume / Visuals: Oversized hoodies (hood up), shaggy hair, always holding a small gift box.
Signature Move: "The Subject Change": Avoids a direct question with a perfect compliment.

Super Powers: Viscosity Manipulation: Hardens liquid "paint" armor. Roller Staff: Creates walls/barriers.
Weaknesses: Solvents: Paint thinner dissolves armor. Chocolate: Makes armor soft/tacky. Bad Back: L4 vertebrae pain.
Costume / Visuals: White fireproof painter overalls, respirator mask, safety goggles, utility belt.
Signature Move: "The Final Coat": Floods area with sludge that hardens, freezing everyone.

Super Powers: Domestic Force: Indestructible energy shields. Omega Spoon: Hits like a truck. Cookies: Heals injuries.
Weaknesses: BOGO Sales: Distracted by discounts. Soap Operas: Unavailable 1-2pm. Bedtime: weak after 8:30pm.
Costume / Visuals: Navy blue tactical scrubs with daisy print, steel-wool knit shawl, rocket-heeled nursing shoes.
Signature Move: "The Time-Out": Traps villain in a sound-proof energy playpen.

Super Powers: Living Capacitor: Absorbs/shoots electricity. Schematic Vision: Sees wiring in walls/robots.
Weaknesses: Insulation: Rubber blocks powers. Frugality: Hates wasting "expensive" energy.
Costume / Visuals: High-vis vest, orange work pants, hard hat with lamp, thick rubber lineman gloves.
Signature Move: "The Blackout": Drains neighborhood power for one massive flashbang blast.
